item.title: Tree cut down ( maybe unauthorised removal), 10th September
item.description:
The existing tree appears to have been cut down. Not sure who did this but suspect it was not the council. There was no notice provided for its removal. I suspect someone has decided to cut down the tree on their own volition. Please could we have a replacement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Avenue, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of rubbish been here for over two weeks, 10th September

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Framlingham Crescent, Elmstead, London

item.title: Outside 4 Keyes Road and ion opposite side of the road a huge double mistress headboard has been dumped with additional boxes, 10th September
item.description:
This is a reocurring problem and I live at 6 Keyes Road and clear rubbish daily that is left outside the tree at 4 Keyes Road. It is now attracting rats as people leave food bags everyday that are torn open by foxes during the night. CCTV could easily be installed (even from my house) and you should put fly tipping signs up with penalties for tipping. There was one before but the council took it down! This is an urgent health and safety issue and should be dealt with immediately.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Keyes Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Fly tipping, 10th September
item.description:
We once again have fly tipping outside and rubbish strewn across the entrance to our flat. Our bin area needs to be contained. When will Hackney council take this seriously? It poses a health and safety risk and encourages pests.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Between lampposts 73W13 and 73W12 3rd property on the right from Willow Vale in Willow Grove. Footway completely obstructed every night and every morning 06:30 hrs 10/09/25. Pedestrians have to walk in the road to pass. Particular hazard for disabled, blind, partially sighted, visually impaired, elderly and children using the footpath., 10th September
item.description:
Between lampposts 73W13 and 73W12 3rd property on the right from Willow Vale in Willow Grove. Footway completely obstructed every night and every morning 06:30 hrs 10/09/25. Pedestrians have to walk in the road to pass. Particular hazard for disabled, blind, partially sighted, visually impaired, elderly and children using the footpath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Grove, Chislehurst, London
